text: The 2009–10 Karnataka State Film Awards, presented by Government of Karnataka, to felicitate the best of Kannada Cinema released in the year 2009.Vishnuvardhan Anu Prabhakar | Karnataka State Film Awards | Aaptha Rakshaka Pareekshe The ceremony was held on 15 May 2012. ==Lifetime achievement award== {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Awardee(s) !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Awarded As |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Dr. Rajkumar Award Puttanna Kanagal Award Dr. Vishnuvardhan Award |R. N. Sudarshan C. V. Shivashankar S. D. Ankalagi |Supporting Actor,Director Director,Lyricist Producer |} == Jury == A committee headed by Dwarakish was appointed to evaluate the feature films awards. == Film Awards == {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Film !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Producer !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Director |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |First Best Film |Rasarushi Kuvempu |Aravind Prakash Padma Prakash |Rithwik Simha |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Second Best Film |Manasaare |Rockline Venkatesh |Yogaraj Bhat |- style="background- color:#F4F4F4" |Third Best Film |Love Guru |Naveen |Prashanth Raj |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Film Of Social Concern |Shabari |Ramesh Yadav |Baraguru Ramachandrappa |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" | rowspan="2" |Best Children Film |Gurukula |Sunil Puranik |Sunil Puranik |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Kinnara Baale |Everest India Films |P. H. Vishwanath |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Regional Film |Kazaar (Konkani language) | | |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |} == Other Awards == {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Film !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Awardee(s) |- style="background- color:#F4F4F4" |Best Direction |Rasarushi Kuvempu |Rithwik Simha |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Actor |Aptharakshaka |Vishnuvardhan |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Actress |Pareekshe |Anu Prabhakar |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Supporting Actor |Banni |Neenasam Ashwath |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Supporting Actress |Runaanubandha |Chandrakala Mohan |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Child Actor |Ekameva |Chiranjeevi |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Child Actress |Kinnara Baale |Madhushree |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Female Playback Singer |Aptharakshaka ("Omkara") |Lakshmi Nataraj |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Cinematography |Kallara Santhe |Sundaranath Suvarna |- style="background- color:#F4F4F4" |Best Lyrics |Sathya ("Eradakshara") |V. Nagendra Prasad |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Sound Recording |Just Maath Maathalli |Kumar |- style="background- color:#F4F4F4" |Best Art Direction |Aptharakshaka |S. A. Venugopal |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Screenplay |Eddelu Manjunatha |Guruprasad |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Dialogue Writer |Banni |Godachi Maharudrappa |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Male Dubbing Artist |Banni |Siddaraj Kalyankar |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Best Female Dubbing Artist |Just Maath Maathalli |Deepa |- style="background- color:#F4F4F4" |Jury's Special Award |Kallara Santhe |Sumana Kittur (For Effective Directorial Debut) |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4 |} ==Controversy== On August 14, 2015 in an unprecedented move, the Government of Karnataka is taking back four State film awards conferred on two films. The decision on conferring these awards has been questioned by S. Radha in the High Court of Karnataka on the contention that the applications for these awards were accepted after the expiry of the deadline fixed by the government to receive entries. The government, according to sources in the Information Department, is making an all-out effort to “avoid humiliation” and are appealing to the recipients to return the awards. The taken awards are as follows: * Best Story - Nagathihalli Chandrashekar for Olave Jeevana Lekkachaara * Best Male Playback Singer - Tippu * Best Music Director - V. Harikrishna * Best Editor - Srinivas P. Babu Above three awards for Raaj The Showman ==References== Category:2009 Indian film awards Category:2010 Indian film awards
title: 2009–10 Karnataka State Film Awards
